title: Architected a Modular Replay System (LARS) for Automated Vehicle Testing
tags: controls, vehicle-testing, vehicle-integration, CANFD, software-architecture, hardware-architecture, simulink, matlab, ROS2, python, UDP, linux, networking
content: Developed and deployed a vehicle-agnostic system to enable repeatable and consistent testing of automated controllers across multiple platforms.

title: Deployed a VIL Test Platform to CARB facility for the EcoCAR Dynamometer Event
tags: controls, dynamometer-testing, vehicle-testing, vehicle-integration, simulation-testing, software-architecture, networking, UDP, CAN/CANFD, hardware-architecture
content: Led the design and implementation of a standardized Vehicle-in-the-Loop (VIL) communication interface, enabling repeatable and collaborative dynamometer testing for 13 university teams.

title: Architected a Comma.ai-based VIL Test Platform for Rapid Controller Deployment
tags: controls, hardware-in-the-loop, vehicle-testing, Comma.ai, software-architecture, CAN, simulink, ROS, python, toyota-prius
content: Developed a vehicle-agnostic software framework fully integrated with Comma.ai hardware, enabling rapid deployment and testing of new autonomous control algorithms on a physical vehicle.

title: Bakery Pricing Tool
tags: python, streamlit, sqlite, numpy, data-management, software-development, full-stack
content: Yes, you read that right. I developed a full-stack web application to accurately calculate profit margins for baked goods, featuring a SQLite backend, a Python-based calculation engine, and a Streamlit front-end.

title: Characterized Sensor Performance in Real-World Weather Conditions
tags: sensor-fusion, data-pipeline, python, ROS, camera, lidar, radar, weather-research, multi-disciplinary, yolo, object-detection, object-classification, data-analysis, SSH
content: Designed a static sensor array and developed a data logging and analysis pipeline to quantify the effects of weather on LiDAR, camera, and radar sensors.

title: CAV Organizer for EcoCAR EV Challenge
content: Led the Connected and Automated Vehicle (CAV) track of the EcoCAR EV Challenge, a $6 million DOE program, guiding 13 university teams in developing next-generation autonomous systems.

title: Founder of a Failed Startup (Revision Autonomy)
content: Co-founded a startup to commercialize autonomous vehicle perception technology, leveraging the NSF I-Corps program and lean startup principles to validate our business model.

title: Curated a Full ML-Pipeline for Tire Track Identification on Snow-Covered Roads
tags: AI/ML, computer-vision, opencv, python, ROS, GCP, data pipeline, PyQT
content: Developed and implemented a machine learning-based perception system to enable autonomous vehicle navigation when lane lines are occluded by snow.

title: Developed a Computer Vision Model for Gravel Road Edge Detection
tags: computer-vision, python, data-pipeline, vehicle-integration, opencv, camera, linux, opencv, CAN/CANFD
content: Engineered a custom computer vision model to accurately detect the drivable edges of gravel and unpaved roads, a critical step for autonomous navigation.

title: Perception System Data Collection in Adverse Weather
tags: perception, camera, lidar, radar, CAN/CANFD, data-pipeline, drive-by-wire, ROS, GCP, cloud, PyQT, GUI, UI/UX, linux, sensor-fusion, yolo, object-detection, object-classification, lane detection, data-analysis, software-architecture, hardware-architecture, vehicle-integration
content: Architected a full hardware and software stack for a Kia Niro HEV, creating a robust, low-cost platform for autonomous vehicle research and data collection.

title: Integrated a Simulation-Trained RL Agent for End-to-End Lateral Control
tags: AI/ML, reinforcement-learning, controls, simulation, ROS, hardware-integration, vehicle-testing, python, end-to-end
content: Developed and deployed a camera-based, end-to-end reinforcement learning model trained in a virtual environment to control a full-sized autonomous vehicle.

title: Trained a Deep Neural Network for Autonomous RC Car Control
tags: AI/ML, computer-vision, deep-learning, CNN, embedded-systems, hardware-integration, data-collection, python, raspberry-pi, donkey-car
content: Built a full software and hardware stack to train an end-to-end Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for steering a physical RC car based on camera data.

title: Completed Udacity's Intro to Self-Driving Cars Nanodegree
tags: computer-vision, pytorch, sensor-fusion, controls, path-planning, behavioral-cloning, python, C++
content: A series of projects covering foundational concepts in autonomous systems, including computer vision, sensor fusion, localization, and control.
